meanings.definition: Beyond what is usual or ordinary; extreme.
meanings.sent1: The storm brought ultra winds that shook the entire town.
meanings.sent2: She wore an ultra bright dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: His ultra loud sneeze startled everyone in the room.
meanings.sent4: The ultra heat of the desert made the sand scorching hot.
meanings.sent5: The ultra tall mountain peak seemed to touch the sky.

meanings.definition: Beyond the range or limits of.
meanings.sent1: The ultra marathon tested the limits of human endurance.
meanings.sent2: The spaceship traveled at ultra speeds through space.
meanings.sent3: The ultra long line at the amusement park made them rethink their visit.
meanings.sent4: Her ultra long hair flowed down her back like a waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The ultra wide river seemed to stretch endlessly into the horizon.

meanings.definition: Extremely high or great in degree or intensity.
meanings.sent1: The ultra spicy chili made his mouth burn.
meanings.sent2: The concert was an ultra exciting event for the fans.
meanings.sent3: The ultra busy street was filled with honking cars.
meanings.sent4: Her ultra sweet smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The ultra loud music made it hard to hear anything else.
